SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: UPDATE b_video_resources SET Video_ID=@@Video_ID@@% <%=,Video_Name_CH=@@Video_Name_CH@@%> <%=,Video_Name_HK=@@Video_Name_HK@@%> <%=,Video_URL=@@Video_URL@@%> <%=,Video_Location=@@Video_Location@@%> <%=,Video_Status=@@Video_Status@@%> <%=,Video_Seq=@@Video_Seq@@%> <%=,Update_Time=@@Update_Time@@%> <%=,Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@%> <%=,Update_User=@@Update_User@@%> WHERE Video_ID=@@Video_ID@@;

SELECT Video_ID,Video_Name_CH,Video_Name_HK,Video_URL,Video_Location,Video_Status,Video_Seq,Create_Time,Create_UserId,Create_User,Update_Time,Update_UserId,Update_User FROM b_video_resources WHERE 1=1 <%= AND Video_ID=@@Video_ID@@%> <%= AND Video_Name_CH=@@Video_Name_CH@@%> <%= AND Video_Name_HK=@@Video_Name_HK@@%> <%= AND Video_URL=@@Video_URL@@%> <%= AND Video_Location=@@Video_Location@@%> <%= AND Video_Status=@@Video_Status@@%> <%= AND Video_Seq=@@Video_Seq@@%> <R%= LIMIT @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ; SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM b_video_resources WHERE 1=1 <%= AND Video_ID=@@Video_ID@@%> <%= AND Video_Name_CH=@@Video_Name_CH@@%> <%= AND Video_Name_HK=@@Video_Name_HK@@%> <%= AND Video_URL=@@Video_URL@@%> <%= AND Video_Location=@@Video_Location@@%> <%= AND Video_Status=@@Video_Status@@%> <%= AND Video_Seq=@@Video_Seq@@%> ;
